citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:35pm on 28-Feb-
22. Spoke to the licensee who indicated he wasn't able to facilitate the inspection. Discussed with the licensee an
alternate designee could also facilitate inspections. Encouraged the licensee to make contact with the inspector either
through email or text if hours or availability change.
End Section
